Comment: Rubio sacrificing any non partisan equity and reputation he had on to trump’s ego bonfire is amusing. It wasn’t that long ago that republicans remembered the how, why and when of Germany took up the limitations it has chosen on some speech. But when you have actually Nazis cavorting with the potus, I guess Rubio is just doing what’s expected.  “America alone” isn’t “America first” and hasn’t been since Dec 7, 1941.
